    de.esoco.data.storage.StorageAdapter, java.io.Serializable, org.obrel.core.Relatable

    public class DatabaseStorageAdapter
extends de.esoco.data.storage.AbstractStorageAdapter
    A storage adapter for accessing database storages.

      • getCurrentQueryCriteria

        public de.esoco.storage.QueryPredicate<de.esoco.entity.Entity> getCurrentQueryCriteria()
        Returns the current query of this instance. This will return the query predicate that had been created by the last execution of the method performQuery(StringDataElement) .
        Returns:
        The current query predicate or NULL if no query has been executed yet

      • performQuery

        public de.esoco.data.element.QueryResultElement<de.esoco.lib.model.DataModel<java.lang.String>> performQuery(de.esoco.data.element.StringDataElement rQueryParams)
                                                                                                      throws de.esoco.storage.StorageException
        Performs a query on a Storage and returns a data element that contains the result.
        Parameters:
        rQueryParams - A data element list containing the query parameters
        Returns:
        A data element containing the query result
        Throws:
        de.esoco.storage.StorageException - If accessing the storage fails

      • positionOf

        public int positionOf(java.lang.Object rId)
               throws de.esoco.storage.StorageException
        Allows to query the position of an entity with a certain ID in the query result of this adapter.
        Parameters:
        rId - The ID of the entity to query the position of
        Returns:
        The entity position or -1 if undefined
        Throws:
        de.esoco.storage.StorageException - If the database query fails

      • querySize

        public int querySize()
              throws de.esoco.storage.StorageException
        Allows to query the position of an entity with a certain ID in the query result of this adapter.
        Returns:
        The entity position or -1 if undefined
        Throws:
        de.esoco.storage.StorageException - If the database query fails

      • setQueryParameters

        public <E extends de.esoco.entity.Entity> void setQueryParameters(de.esoco.storage.QueryPredicate<E> pBaseQuery,
                                                                  de.esoco.lib.expression.Function<de.esoco.entity.Entity,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> fGetAttributes,
                                                                  de.esoco.lib.expression.Predicate<? super E> pDefaultCriteria,
                                                                  de.esoco.lib.expression.Predicate<? super E> pDefaultSortCriteria,
                                                                  java.util.List<de.esoco.lib.model.ColumnDefinition> rColumns)
        Sets the query parameters of this instance.
        Parameters:
        pBaseQuery - A query predicate containing the base query
        fGetAttributes - A function that retrieves the attribute value strings from an entity
        pDefaultCriteria - An optional predicate containing default criteria to be used if no specific constraints are given
        pDefaultSortCriteria - An optional predicate containing default sort criteria to be used if no specific sort fields are given
        rColumns - The query columns
